results.title: The Family Law Production stills
results.brief_description: Based on Benjamin Law’s 2010 book, The Family Law was the first Australian TV show to focus on an Asian Australian family. While it explores familiar stories about an everyday family, it offers a unique perspective on what it means to be Australian today.

details.label: Curatorial section
display_values: The Story of the Moving Image → Moving Australia → 11. Screen Australia Showcase

results.brief_description:
View Master Viewing Reels from Sawyer’s, Inc.
FT-2 Hansel and gretel.

results.title: Jack the Giant Killer lantern slides
results.brief_description: Magic lantern slides made up of printed coloured images on round pices of glass mounted in a rectangular wood frame with a glue/resin. Frame has printed green label attached on one end noting ‘Patent Enamel Slides for the Magic Lantern, J Barnard & Son, Maker, London, Jack The Giant Killer. #’, the other end of slide has embossed text noting ‘B&S PATENT’.
